programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Jermell Charlo
programme.desc: One of the most anticipated fights in boxing takes place at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas as two Undisputed World Champions meet -unified Super Middleweight titleholder, Canelo Alvarez, defending against Junior Middleweight champ Jermell Charlo. Canelo has established himself as one of boxing's best fighters, winning World Titles in four different weight classes on his way to becoming boxing's biggest star.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Arturo Gatti facing off with Alfonso Gomez in what would be Gatti's final boxing match. Also on the card, Andre Berto takes on veteran Carlos Quintana on his way to stardom.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 3
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Biomechanics of Body Preparation
programme.desc: In this episode we follow one of our martial artists as he goes through a grueling tournament and how he uses technology to help him prepare for it.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Women's Weapons Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Gerry Penalosa vs. Jhonny Gonzalez
programme.desc: This episode features Jhonny Gonzalez defending his WBO bantamweight title against Gerry Penalosa, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. Freddy Hernandez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Andre Berto defend the WBC welterweight championship against Freddy Hernandez. With one quick, hard right hand to the face in the first round, this bout comes to a sudden halt. Berto looks to keep his undefeated streak alive and thrust himself into talks for bigger fights with the likes of stars such as Floyd Mayweather. Also on the card, Jean Pascal looks for an upset in the light heavyweight division.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Hague Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Hague Grand Prix and we follow some of Netherlands' judo heroes as they try to mark the event with a medal tally to be proud of.

programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Female fighter Carina "Barbie" Damm battles all three rounds against Molly "The Maulinator" Helsel in Costa Rica.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Hugo Hernan Garay
programme.desc: With the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Huck (33-1) defends against veteran contender Hugo Garay (34-6) at the Olympia Eissportzentrum in Munich, Germany. Huck, fighting in his adoptive home country, was making the 7th consecutive defense of his championship.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Miami Finals: Part 1
programme.desc: Thirty finalists return to Miami with a chance to land one of 15 spots in Las Vegas. In addition to the qualifying round's 6 obstacles, athletes must tackle 4 additional challenges--including the all-new Minefield!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Michael Katsidis
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a highly-praised and hard-hitting lightweight championship fight featuring Juan Manuel Marquez and Michael Katsidis that was named HBO's 2010 Fight of the Year. Also on the card, welterweight champion Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC World super welterweight title between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya that made $165 million in total gross revenue, making it the richest fight ever, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 3 of 4.

programme.title: Bradshaw Ranch Pt. 2
programme.desc: Andy and Paul return to Bradshaw Ranch in Sedona, Arizona in search of a rumoured secret military base, and find themselves in a situation that could jeopardise the entire Beyond Skinwalker mission.

programme.title: Into The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: Jeff MacKinnon's team battles thick kelp, brutal currents, and a looming storm while searching Scatarie Island's coast. Just as the storm hits, they make a crucial discovery.

programme.title: Sacred Strongholds
programme.desc: There are some strongholds built to protect the sacred. But there are others used for more sinister purposes. In this episode, we uncover the stories behind some of the world's most imposing structures.

programme.title: The Search For Extraterrestrial Life
programme.desc: What could lie beyond the confines of the Milky Way? Are there galaxies similar to our own? Could they be capable of sustaining intelligent life? And is that life trying to contact us?

programme.title: The Crop Circle Code
programme.desc: More than 10,000 crop circle formations have been documented in over 50 countries, and many display properties that defy conventional explanations. Are they of otherworldly origin?

programme.title: Heavy Lifting
programme.desc: The team continues to chase a tunnel that may run directly below the Garden Shaft and into the Baby Blob, where tests revealed high traces of silver and gold.

programme.title: Deep Space
programme.desc: While space has always been the final frontier, it's also been an unknowable one that every country has wanted to be first to conquer. Finally, newly released documents give us glimpses into their plans.

programme.desc: All over the world are forbidden 'triangles' - mysterious regions where ships, planes, and people enter and then just disappear. They are found in Bermuda, Alaska, Japan and elsewhere. But why?

programme.desc: The Batangas region of the Philippines is famous for its butterfly-knife makers and wielders. Jaime learns a few tricks as she passes through but when she comes under unexpected attack, will they work?

programme.desc: In the fourth episode of a five-part event, it's back to the Forged in Fire Gladiator Arena for two more sudden death battles. Our defending champion currently has four wins under his belt.

programme.title: Collapse
programme.desc: The Arctic's frozen landscape continues to push the remaining survivalists to the brink. One participant finds themselves at risk for frostbite, while another is convinced the end days are near.

programme.title: Best Of: Big Dollar Days
programme.desc: Mike stumbles upon a one-of-a kind '39 Cadillac Madam X with a steep price tag. Will he be able to resist? Meanwhile Frank puts it all on the line for a pair of Indian motorcycles.

programme.title: Episode 13 (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: In the season finale, Udayam takes on their biggest challenge yet as they meet with a large family of 8. Providing a makeover suitable for all of them while making it functional is no easy feat, especially within a constrained space. Will the team manage to close this season with all smiles?

programme.title: (PG - Violence) Episode 13 (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nivedha accepts Mano's offer. She joins their alliance to steal the code from Charan.. Nivedha in the name of Rakshi is brought to Charan who is overjoyed to see her. However when he refuses to reveal the password, Mano puts Rakshi's life at knifepoint. The police steps in during the confrontation. It was all a game plan to nail down the cyber criminals. The police made use of Yuvan and the real" Rakshi" to trap and arrest Mano and the syndicate.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: A heart-warming and inspiring episodic series that shines a spotlight on the unsung heroes of volunteerism. By honouring volunteers and providing them with support and opportunities for personal growth and fulfilment, UDAYAM 5 initiative not only celebrates their contributions but also encourages others to join the volunteering journey. Together, we can continue to build a more caring and inclusive society where everyone plays a part in creating positive change.

programme.title: Jamie's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals (S1)
programme.desc: This time, Jamie shows us a roast dinner cooked all together in one pot, cutting down on washing up but never on flavour; and his store-cupboard version of a speedy carbonara that can use up whatever veg you have to hand. programme.title: Invisible Hideaways
programme.desc: In Uruguay we venture deep within the rural countryside to an area of remote forests and lakes to a one hundred hectare resort of mirrored cabins. In Sweden we visit the Kolarbyn Eco Lodge - a rustic retreat of 12 hobbit like huts that are replicas of those built in this forest by people making charcoal from as far back as the 1800s.

programme.title: Stairs
programme.desc: A musical staircase magically appears in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take turns making music as they go up and down the stairs.

programme.title: Milk
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'milk' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of milk - pink milk, banana milk and bedtime milk. Dee even gets a milk moustache!

programme.title: The Floor is Bananas
programme.desc: Helping Hand builds a banana-themed obstacle course. But when Phoebe becomes competitive, she must work with her team to make it over the finish line together.

programme.title: Messy Moves a Mountain
programme.desc: Rocky Mountain is feeling down in the dumps because he's never been to the beach, so Messy and his friends from OKIDO come up with a clever plan to cheer him up!

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: The Decider
programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: The Sibling Badge
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: The Why Badge
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Campfire Choir
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Stick Time
programme.desc: How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Solar Race: Australia
programme.desc: Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.title: Asparagus
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.title: Teasing
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Andy and the Meerkat Pups
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Botswana, Africa and embark on a baby animal mission to help a meerkat family move home. Along the way, Andy meets some zebra and must race across an enormous salt pan to escape a hungry jackal.

programme.title: Mission: Seaside
programme.desc: Kika and Dr Amit learn a new route on their way to the seaside. But when Anoushka forgets her jacket, they have to retrace their steps in a hurry before they miss the bus home.

programme.title: Dhole and Dwarf Mongoose
programme.desc: In this episode we meet the dhole and dwarf mongoose - their wild connection is that they both use sentries.

programme.title: Sandcastle Squish
programme.desc: Seaweed arrives on deck playing a new game called Sandcastle Squish on his console, but Captain Captain takes it off him and quickly becomes obsessed with it, neglecting her captain's duties. It's up to the pirates to try and get her to stop playing the game.

programme.title: The Pottery Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Honey Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Tadpole Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jet Academy: Map Readers
programme.desc: Glitch races the Go Jetters across the Academy to find the lost G.O. Dome of the Ancients.

programme.title: Wolong Panda Reserve, China
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit a nature reserve in China. But who's taking all the pandas' bamboo?

programme.title: Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Toby's passengers can't stop making fun of him, that is until he discovers two villains trying to steal King Godred's crown.

programme.title: Scooter Stand Still
programme.desc: Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah & Duck help him to get it back.

programme.title: Music Fixer
programme.desc: Sarah's Tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: Cynthia asks Stanley to teach her to fly an aeroplane for Fifi's birthday. Stanley constructs a flight simulator and has the help of their friends to put her through her paces.

programme.title: Recital
programme.desc: Myrtle wants everyone to see her new dance so enlists Stanley to gather some friends. However, the stereo breaks so they have to make their own music.

programme.title: Pretend Piggy
programme.desc: Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: It's Time to be a Superhero
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are at the library for the Super Saleem book launch, while JoJo wonders what makes a superhero and what her superpower may be.

programme.title: Granny Mobile
programme.desc: Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Smoochy Kiss
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want Dad all to themselves and will not let Mum have a smoochy kiss. They try to hide him all around the house, but Mum is desperate to spend a little romance time with her husband.

programme.title: The Train Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: The Dancing Bug Badge
programme.desc: Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: What's Hot?
programme.desc: Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Solar Race: Australia
programme.desc: Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.title: Pak Choi
programme.desc: Pak Choi, who might be known by many names, sings about how she's "Always Pak To You!"

programme.title: Mango
programme.desc: It's wish-granter Mango, ready to make all the Roots and Fruits cast wishes come true.

programme.title: Spooky Day
programme.desc: Supertato runs in fright when Pumpkin tries to make friends with him, but later realises she needs his help as she's stuck in the air hanging from balloons set up by Evil Pea.

programme.title: Pea's Power Suit
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the world's first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Go Outside
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po want to go outside but it's raining. Some wellies and umbrellas magically appear and the Teletubbies go outside for splashy, rainy fun.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'plane' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore a flying plane, a landing plane, a fast plane and even meeting a sneezing plane!

programme.title: The First Big Camping Adventure
programme.desc: The friends are excited to go on a camping trip, but Zip is nervous about being in a dark place away from home. He must try to overcome his fears.

programme.title: Carroty Carrots

programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Hidey Hup

programme.title: Tiger
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'tiger' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a stripy tiger, a swimming tiger, a cheeky tiger and Dee even has a tea party with a tiger!

programme.title: The Friendship Parade
programme.desc: Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Bubble Trouble
programme.desc: Bubbles, bubbles, all over OKIDO! Zam invents a super-strong bubble machine, but things go a bit wrong and Zim finds himself in a spot of bother.

programme.title: Promises

programme.title: Movie - Meendum Amman
programme.desc: Rajeshwari, a devotee of Goddess Akkamma, must fight Karkotakudu, a monster, after he tries to destroy Earth while taking control of everyone on the planet.

programme.title: Movie - Kaatu Puli
programme.desc: Sanjay's family goes on a picnic into a forest. There, they encounter a dangerous gang.

programme.title: Movie - Thoovaanam
programme.desc: After Anu rejects his proposal, Karthi tries to commit suicide, but his friends save him. Later, Anu realises her mistake and falls in love with him, only to learn that now he wants to ruin her life.

programme.title: Movie - Thulli Ezhundhadhu Kadhal
programme.desc: Nandini, Kishore, Mahesh, Scud, Bhakti, Jessica, Chandana and Sridhar are college friends. Once they graduate, they start focussing on their careers. However, there is more to their life than that.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Captain
programme.desc: Kannayiram, a powerful gangster, kills Ramasamy for not giving up his land to him. After hearing this news, Shiva, Ramasamy's brother, flees the military camp to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Movie - Seeri Varum Kaalai
programme.desc: Kaalai helps women who face domestic violence from their in-laws. He meets Kamakshi who is regularly harassed by her sister-in-law. He helps her and eventually they get married.

programme.title: Movie - Aanpavam
programme.desc: A young man lands in the wrong house with a marriage proposal and ends up falling in love with the girl. However, trouble begins to brew when the girl's real suitor turns up.

programme.title: Movie - Bheesma
programme.desc: A wise-cracking meme creator gets the chance to prove himself to the girl he loves when he is suddenly appointed to be the CEO of her workplace.

programme.title: Movie - Sabari
programme.desc: Sabarivasan, a cardiologist, works in a government hospital during the day and runs a clinic at night. He attracts the enmity of a local goon when he gets the goon's partner arrested.

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Vathiyar
programme.desc: A scientist gets into trouble when he develops a formula that enables the soul to move out of a body and enter the person or animal present in close proximity.

programme.title: Movie - Thullum Kaalam
programme.desc: This movie stars Pandiarajan, Vineetha, Rajeev and Tharika, and is directed by Sarana. Produced by Lakshmi Shankar Movies.

programme.title: Movie - Udhayamagiradhu
programme.desc: A girl becomes a dancer when her mother falls ill, but is exploited by the rich villagers. She takes refuge under a revered figure, but he too falters. She then decides to start life afresh.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Manithan (Old)
programme.desc: Manithan is a Tamil movie starring Rajinikanth, Roobini and Raghuvaran.

programme.title: Movie - Adharmam
programme.desc: Dharma is a sandalwood smuggler who plants a sapling for every tree he chops. After his death, his brother Arjuna handles the business and asserts that the state is responsible for the rise in crime.

programme.title: Movie - Uyirile Kalandhathu
programme.desc: A man, who is the youngest in the family and much pampered, is detested by his elder brother. He falls for a girl and decides to meet her family, but out of animosity, his brother damages his image in front of them.

programme.title: Movie - Namma Annachi
programme.desc: Annachi uses unscrupulous ways to help the villagers overcome their problems, while his son is stickler for rules and believes in abiding by the law. Contrasting views lead to a clash between the two.

programme.title: Movie - Ponniyin Selvan 2
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother Ponniyin Selvan's presumed death, Aditha Karikalan of the Chola dynasty rallies his kingdom and tries to resist threats on all sides.

programme.title: Lady Flower Fist
programme.desc: Mui Tsui Fa (Kwan Wing Ho) met Fong Tak (Kong Wa), the richest man in Guangzhou, when she visited her father. They had some misunderstandings and were against each other. Then, Fa offended the General and she had to marry Tak to avoid being punished. Fa, in becoming Tak‘s fourth concubine, aroused jealousy and hate in Tak’s house._x000D__x000D_The Tso Sect leader held a contest to seek a husband for his daugher, Siu Wan (Chan Siu Ha). Fa won the match in a man‘s disguise.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Pui’s confidence was badly shattered.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). programme.title: Bodyguard Cantik Bikin Hati Nggak Kuat
programme.desc: Jamilah inherited a power that is only passed down to the women in her family. Unlike ordinary women, Jamilah can do heavy work. But Jamilah can only use her power for good and must not reveal it to others. Because of her magical power, which is passed down from her family, Jamilah cannot live a normal life. Jamilah's fate suddenly takes a dramatic turn when a young boss named Reno discovers her secret.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Kukira Pacar Sewaan Ternyata ke Pelaminan
programme.desc: For his father's sake, Mario intentionally paid Sarah to be his girlfriend. Mario and Sarah initially agreed that this was necessary solely to persuade Mario's father to undergo surgery.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Bodyguard Cantik Bikin Hati Nggak Kuat
programme.desc: Jamilah inherited a power that is only passed down to the women in her family. Unlike ordinary women, Jamilah can do heavy work. But Jamilah can only use her power for good and must not reveal it to others. Because of her magical power, which is passed down from her family, Jamilah cannot live a normal life. Jamilah's fate suddenly takes a dramatic turn when a young boss named Reno discovers her secret.

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Boleh Tukar Nasib Tapi Jangan Tukar Cinta
programme.desc: Dara, accompanied by Zaky, goes to Jakarta to find the boss of the company that burned her land. By chance, Dara has an accident and meets Aurel, who looks just like her. It turns out that Aurel is the daughter of the boss Dara is looking for. Dara takes this opportunity to switch places with Aurel.

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Cinta Si Boss Galak Double Kill
programme.desc: Fitri was surprised when Reynard took her to work as a domestic helper in his house. Fitri, who had no skills as a domestic helper, slowly accepted the job in order to have a job and a place to live. However, Fitri was always patient with her fierce boss.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Mendadak Tenar Sungguh di Luar Nalar
programme.desc: It all started with Nina, the seblak seller. The owner of the seblak stall looked so much like Tasya that they could have been twins. Eventually, Bryan, Tasya's manager, met Tasya by chance.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Bidan Desa Penuh Cinta
programme.desc: Rara is a midwife in a village. In an incident, Rara meets Gigih, a vegetable seller. When Rara has a patient who wants to give birth, Rara stops Gigih, who is on his way to the market. Gigih is very upset with Rara because they have met twice in incidents that have annoyed him. One day, Gigih's parents fall ill and need to be examined immediately. Despite still being angry with Rara, Gigih reluctantly asks her to check on his mother's condition.

programme.title: ANAK BAND

programme.title: Kamu Terlalu Wah Untuk Aku Yang Hah
programme.desc: Joko is a new doctor assigned to work in Rina's village. The longer Joko stays in Rina's village, the more often he meets Rina. The more often he meets Rina, the more Joko seems to have a crush on her, but Rina feels she is not worthy of him because she is just a village woman while Joko is a doctor.

Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Tutorial Ajak Nikah Jalur Express
programme.desc: An older sister who is seriously ill and has to take care of her only child because her husband is irresponsible. She asks her younger sister, Zahra, and her friend, Andika, to get married in front of her while she is sick so that they can take care of her niece.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Bisaku Hanya Mencintaimu, Mas Sosis
programme.desc: Nela ran away from home and moved into a boarding house to avoid an arranged marriage by her parents. However, Nela felt uncomfortable because the boarding house room she was staying in was close to Dito's chicken coop. This often led to arguments between Nela and Dito. Actually, Dito is a master's program student. However, he chose to start a business selling viral sausage instead of working in an office like his brother, Fito.

programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Microsoft: The Tech Giant's 50 Years (Part 2)
programme.desc: Emily Chang speaks with Microsoft titans Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella about the company's journey from scrappy startup to global powerhouse.

programme.title: Melinda French Gates
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Melinda French Gates in Seattle to discuss how she's navigating her next stage as a philanthropist and investor.

programme.title: Salesforce's Marc Benioff
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Salesforce Co-Founder & CEO Marc Benioff to discuss the rise of AI agents and what it's like to run a very memeable global tech company.

programme.title: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex
programme.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview with Emily Chang about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

programme.title: Super Intelligence
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: Animal Communication
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: Quantum Computing
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: Next Billion
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: Beyond Earth: Private Ambitions in Space
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: How Korean Pop Culture Is Transforming Design
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslinda Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: The Nation Where Robots and Humans Get Along
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Can Global Shipping Go Green?
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Does the Perfect City Exist?
programme.desc: Singapore has transformed itself from a colonial outpost into a thriving metropolis boasting unparalleled infrastructure, seamless transportation and accessible housing.

programme.title: Rebirth of the World's Original Tech Giant
programme.desc: Japan is seeing a renaissance in its chip industry. Spearheaded by giants and startups alike, what lessons are there for the world as this digital transformation takes shape?

programme.title: David Blitzer's Sports Investment Playbook
programme.desc: The hosts sit with David Blitzer, co-founder of Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment, to discuss how his teams use data and analytics to improve the fan experience.

programme.title: Principles With Bill Belichick and Ray Dalio
programme.desc: The hosts sit for a special conversation with two titans, football coach Bill Belichick and Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio, to learn their guiding principles for success.

programme.title: How Youth Sports Became a $38 Billion Play
programme.desc: Major League Baseball Hall of Famer Cal Ripken Jr. and his brother Bill have turned youth sports into big business. But can they chase profits while preserving what's best for kids?

programme.title: NBA President Stokes Africa's Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Toronto Raptors President Masai Ujiri leads the only non-US team in the National Basketball Association, and he's spearheading an effort to take the game global.

programme.title: Shahid Khan Wants to Marry the NFL and EPL
programme.desc: Shahid Khan owns two teams, one in the National Football League and the other in the English Premier League. He's got an ambitious playbook to boost both kinds of football around the world.

programme.title: Women's Soccer Wants to Be More Like the NFL
programme.desc: National Women's Soccer League Commissioner Jessica Berman is presiding over a pivotal moment for women's soccer. Can she help turn astronomical growth into a sustained business?

programme.title: Scambaiter Exposes Massive Dubai Crypto Scam

programme.title: Inside India's Fertility Underworld

programme.title: How a Ugandan Clinic Exposed a Private Healthcare Tragedy
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Brazil's Biggest Bank Heist

programme.title: The IM Academy Story

programme.title: Donnie Goes Deep
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and they're not alone... there's a monster down there with them!

programme.title: Leonardo Saddles Up
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isn't all it's cracked up to be.

programme.title: Rattleconda Racers / Dig a Little Deeper
programme.desc: When Hazel's wish lands her and Antony inside a board game they invented, they must defeat a giant snake to escape! // Hazel wishes to excavate cool rocks but finds herself in hot magma with a group of subterranean rock monsters!

programme.title: Murder She Wished
programme.desc: When Hazel's landlord goes missing, she makes a wish to get to the bottom of the case!

programme.title: Rowena's Plant / What a Doll
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help Rowena cure her sick plant, without knowing it was actually a trap and they are in fact helping her to catch Smurfs. // Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with.

programme.title: I Want a Dragon / Magic Meltdown
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf is rescued by Lily and Blizzard. He'd also like a dragon friend to protect him. // Chef Smurf has accidentally brought an old cauldron back to life and it wants revenge for having been abandoned.

programme.title: The Great Smurf Games Part 1 and Part 2
programme.desc: It's the Great Smurf Games in the village! The winning team will receive a magical sphere that grants its owner one wish. Clumsy has got his heart set on taking part so that he can win this coveted prize.

programme.title: Guilt Trip / Short cut
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: No Egrets / Meal Ticket
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: Stuntin' / Olly Olly Organ Free
programme.desc: Patrick gets a stunt double. // Patrick's organs leave his body in protest.

programme.title: Mimic Madness / House Worming
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop! // When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering
programme.desc: Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: Orange Carpet All Access: Tim Rex
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: We are about to introduce the cutest and newest family of dinosaurs to our NJR Global Channel! Let's welcome Tim Rex and his family of space dinosaurs!

programme.title: SpongeBob's Place / Plankton Gets the Boot
programme.desc: When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: The Parent Zap
programme.desc: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe transform into them to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up.

programme.title: Bilsky's Billions
programme.desc: When Mitch Bilsky enrolls at SWAG, Headmaster Ray and Danger Force use a combination of patience and powers to help him achieve the impossible and graduate high school.

programme.title: Scream Machine
programme.desc: When Charlotte's invention for The Gizmo Show is accidentally destroyed and then rebuilt, Charlotte worries that the attention she gets could expose Kid Danger and Captain Man's secret identity.

programme.title: The Pearl
programme.desc: The East River 3 are on the verge of victory! The Turtles and Mutanimals must team up to stop them, but not everything is as it seems... what is the PEARL and why does Goldfin want it?

programme.title: Away Game / Monster Cash
programme.desc: Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: Saving Face
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid are determined to find out if the new building tenant is their favorite wrestler - La Tormenta!

programme.title: Wary Gary / Pinned
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes to extreme lengths to trick Gary into going to the vet. // SpongeBob become desperate when he accidentally gets pinned under his exercise equipment and must wait for help to arrive.

programme.title: Jeffy T's Prankwell Emporium / A Taste of Plankton
programme.desc: Squidward's prankster dad visits and brings all sorts of gags with him (much to Squidward's annoyance). // Plankton tries to get a taste of the secret formula by attaching himself to SpongeBob's tongue.

programme.title: Smartificial Intelligence / Firehouse Bob
programme.desc: Perch fights for his job after he's fired and replaced by a robot anchorman. // SpongeBob, Patrick, and Squidward feel the heat when they become volunteer firefighters.

programme.title: Squid Plus One
programme.desc: After receiving an invitation to a gallery opening, Squidward scrambles to find a friend to take with him,.

programme.title: Bubble Bass Reviews / Patrick's Prison Pals
programme.desc: Bubble Bass reviews The Patrick Show. // Bunny brings Patrick to prison for "Bring Your Kid To Work Day".

programme.title: Blunder Party
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day!

programme.title: The Odd Father / Long Shot
programme.desc: Carlos has to choose Carlitos' Padrino in time for his Christening, but will he make the right call? // Carlota needs a PE credit in order to graduate, so she and Ronnie Anne set out to find the right sport for her.

programme.title: Intern for the Worse / The Old and the Restless
programme.desc: Tensions run high when Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship at Flip's and compete to win the manager title. // When Lincoln sees how tame Pop Pop has gotten in his older age, he takes him out for a day to remember.

programme.title: Suite and Sour / Back in Black
programme.desc: After Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort, they decide to take the kids - but only because they promised to behave. // When Lucy gets a crush on a 'regular and normal' boy, her sisters give her a makeover.

programme.title: Cookie's Court / Work Her Magic
programme.desc: After losing Hazel to Cosmo and Wanda during the Wish Trials, a scheming Cookie returns for revenge .// Frustrated by her mom's split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her.

programme.title: Lost and Founders Day Pt. 1 / Lost and Founders Day Pt. 2
programme.desc: Dev's dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids' wants at the annual Founder's Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wanda's wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: Orange Carpet All Access: Tim Rex
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: We are about to introduce the cutest and newest family of dinosaurs to our NJR Global Channel! Let's welcome Tim Rex and his family of space dinosaurs!

programme.title: Jailbreak! / Evil Spatula
programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula. // SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.

programme.title: Eek, An Urchin! / Squid's Defense
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: Gary & Spot
programme.desc: Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal - Spot.

programme.title: Hurl, Interrupted / Diamonds are for Never
programme.desc: Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret. // After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

programme.title: The Mad Scientist / Missed Connection
programme.desc: Lisa gets invited to work at an institute and get away from her crazy family. // Lori and Bobby worry that dating long-distance is causing them to lose their connection.

programme.title: Fandom Pains / Rita Her Rights
programme.desc: Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character. // After getting community service for racking up tickets, Mom finds it's more relaxing than being at home.

programme.title: Cookie's Court / Work Her Magic
programme.desc: After losing Hazel to Cosmo and Wanda during the Wish Trials, a scheming Cookie returns for revenge .// Frustrated by her mom's split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her.

programme.title: The Supies
programme.desc: The Supies! Swellview's biggest night for superheros, and Captain Man is not invited. Danger Force enlists Henry's help to make sure the night goes off without a hitch!

programme.title: Minyak Attack
programme.desc: When a tax loophole allows Dr. Minyak to buy the Man's Nest, Captain Man must stand his ground and live with his terrible new roommate while Danger Force tries to find a way to reverse the sale before they lose the Man's Nest for good.

programme.title: Endless Summer
programme.desc: Max pretends to turn evil to infiltrate Mastermind's henchmen and steal the Chip-Chucker, a device that previously turned him evil.

programme.title: The Bucket Trap
programme.desc: Henry and Charlotte want to tell Jasper that Henry is really Kid Danger. They decide to give Jasper a test secret to prove he's ready.

programme.title: Raph VS. Water
programme.desc: The Turtles and Mutanimals are caught in the Storm of the Century! But when a new group of SEA MUTANTS threaten the city... Raph will be forced to use his WORDS to save the day.

programme.title: To Dad and Back / Survivoring
programme.desc: Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: Little Yellow Book / Bumper to Bumper
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: Spatula of the Heavens / Gary's Playhouse
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: My Friend Patty / Fun-Believable
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a sentient Krabby Patty whose only wish is to be eaten. // Rube hosts an episode of "FUN-Believable! With Rube" where he explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: Bye, Bye, Birthday / Tough Guise
programme.desc: Tired of the yearly cheer surrounding her birthday, Lucy casts a spell so her family will forget what day it is. // When Zach is given detention, Rusty and the rest of their friends try to toughen up him up so he'll fit in.

programme.title: Director's Rut / Friday Night Fights
programme.desc: Luan turns to Mr. Coconuts for help after she struggles to direct her school's play. // Lisa joins Lynn's football team as the analytics coach to prove that math will always beat out heart.

programme.title: Wellsington Hotellsington / 1500 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. // When Hazel's wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.title: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl
programme.desc: The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: Sanctuary! / What's Eating Patrick?
programme.desc: When stray snails start appearing around Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob decides to care for them himself. // To defend Bikini Bottom's honor, Patrick enters a Krabby Patty eating competition.

programme.title: Toon in for Danger
programme.desc: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger and Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party.

programme.title: Bummer School
programme.desc: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. After Chloe expresses her anger toward her siblings, they realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now that they're guardians.

programme.desc: The Sony JLPGA Championship is a professional women's golf tournament in Japan. It has a long history of more than 55 years since its establishment in 1968. The 2025 tournament will be played at the Oarai Golf Club in Oarai, Ibaraki.

programme.desc: The TV movie Pak Guru Huruf G Nya Pasti Dari Galak initially tells the story of a man named Bagus (Ridho Illahi). Bagus is a teacher whose wife passed away a long time ago. Bagus lives with his beautiful daughter, Siska. Without Bagus knowing, Siska is secretly liked by Gerry. Siska also likes Gerry, and they decide to date. However, Bagus, who is a teacher at Siska's school, disapproves of Siska and Gerry's closeness because he believes his daughter is still too young.

programme.title: KARNAVAL SCTV 2024
programme.desc: The SCTV Carnival is a variety show broadcast on SCTV that comes to your city. It is enlivened by the cast of SCTV soap operas and local musicians. This time, the SCTV Carnival is coming to Indramayu with special and surprising guest stars.

programme.title: Cintaku Tanpa WO-Mu Seperti Mati Lampu
programme.desc: Ajeng and Chandra's mother are best friends who want their two children to be matched so that they can have a good time. Ajeng (Yuriska Patricia) and Chandra (Fendy Chow) agree to their Mama's request by pretending to be dating. But due to their closeness, their mothers plan to marry off Ajeng and Chandra soon.

programme.title: MASAK APA CEU
programme.desc: A cooking show that demonstrate and inform recipes and how to cook a dish, especially Indonesian cuisines.

programme.title: DOYAN MAKAN
programme.desc: Doyan Makan, will invite viewers to follow a surfing trip and culinary qualifications for popular foods in an area and will also review information on places, prices and the manufacturing process of the food they taste.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 15
programme.desc: Bang Jack plans to build a special boarding school for the elderly. Bang Jack is assisted by his assistant named Habib. Habib is a handsome young man who becomes the child of one of the students.

programme.title: Ditiup Kamu Bikin Cenat-Cenut
programme.desc: The story revolves around the life of a man named Bastian (Cakrawala Airawan). Bastian is a spoiled young man who has recently fallen into poverty after his family's business went bankrupt. He is currently searching for a job. One day, Bastian accidentally collides with Maesaroh (Shanice Margaretha), who was walking while carrying a food container. Bastian quickly helps Maesaroh, ensuring her food container remains intact. Accidentally, Bastian and Maesaroh end up hugging each other.

programme.title: BUMI CENDRAWASIH PAPUA
programme.desc: Ikhsan intends to work in the city, but the city dwellers annoy him with their arrogant behavior. Ikhsan is forced to return to work at his father Mawar's cattle farm. Mawar is madly in love with Ikhsan.

programme.title: KARNAVAL INBOX
programme.desc: Gabungan musik dan variety show di berbagai kota di Indonesia

programme.title: BALI TRADISI
programme.desc: A semi documentary that show about the traditions that has been passed down in Bali.

programme.title: GASPOL
programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: Tanpa Kamu Warga Indonesia Kurang Satu
programme.desc: Bian was shocked when he realized that the girl was Qiara, an old friend of his. However, Qiara could not recognize Bian because she had lost her sight due to an accident. Bian felt sad. From that moment on, Qiara and Bian became very close, even though Qiara actually already had a boyfriend.

programme.title: Neng Cantik Parasit Hatiku Aku Rak Popo
programme.desc: Tiara (Nabila Zavira) has to pretend to be a rich girl in the hope of attracting a rich guy who can change her family's life.

programme.title: Singkat Padat Langsung Akad
programme.desc: Sadam works as a police officer, who often conducts raids. One day, Sadam caught Melly, his first love from the past, while conducting a raid. Strangely, Melly was astonished because Sadam still recognized her. Confused, Melly suddenly felt happy to have Sadam back. What happens next?

programme.title: Tukang Foto Cintanya Jeprat Jepret
programme.desc: Rico was caught cheating with his ex, and Mika wanted to cancel her pre-wedding photoshoot with Rico. Yuda, as a photographer and Rico's good friend, was tasked with persuading Mika.

programme.desc: Each episode of this show introduces a good book, spanning subjects such as science, history, literature, novels and even fashion, sharing interesting knowledge gained from these books.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Legend of Two Sisters in the Chaos
programme.desc: During the Later Zhou dynasty, the Fu family becomes the focus of attention when a prophecy states that one of their daughters will become empress. This leads to people assuming that by destroying the Fu sisters, they will also destroy the throne.

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Shock Mystery (Sr.2) & What's On Today
programme.desc: This show documents strange happenings from all over the world, all of which cannot be explained from a point of view accepted by ordinary people. Explore incredible mysteries that not only existed in the past, but still exist today!

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Heroes In White
programme.desc: A chivalrous doctor, having faced death, is devoted to carrying on his father's humanitarian spirit of helping the world. Educated in the West yet passionate about Chinese traditions, he provides free treatment to one patient after another abandoned by Western medicine.

programme.title: Under The Moonlight
programme.desc: Luo Shu, a young woman trapped in the plight of fate yet determined to save herself, meets Qi Menglin, a spirited youth eager to roam the martial world. Together, they brave hardships and solve mysteries.

programme.title: Blind Travel by Rail
programme.desc: In this travel reality show, the hosts receive surprise train tickets sending them to unpredictable destinations throughout China. Each episode offers spontaneous adventures and cultural discoveries as the cast journeys by rail to places revealed only at the last moment.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Episode 11 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Kualinari symbolizes the symbiotic relationship between a cookware and the cooking techniques that go together in preparing dishes that tantalize the taste buds. Kualinari reflects the reality of learning cooking via online. Watch as couples learn how to cook by just watching a cooking demonstration clip by a guest chef.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 34 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Rais finds out the truth about Matin. Mazi tries to help Matin financially to run away from the authorities. Faza brings Diana to meet his father and stepmother.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 37 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Firman pleads with Iris for her to visit the hospital after Fatimah finds her unconscious at home. He suspects that something is amiss.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 4
programme.desc: Adi, 28, has been wheelchair-bound since an accident which happened when he was 10. As a young kid, he remembers vaguely about the accident but could not recall the exact details as he had amnesia for about 4 months after the accident. His dad, Khairi had left the family for another woman two months before. Khairi's parents and siblings who were against him marrying Salina, a former waitress, had reasons to celebrate. Instead of providing family support to Salina, they distanced themselves away.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 10 - Falling (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Wiwik tries to save Kepindo from falling into Susi’s hands. She tries to coax Neng to attend Kepindo meetings. Tipez prefers to shift her attention to her new found friend. Mel is watching Neng like a hawk and Neng makes more slip-ups. Neng is worried.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 7 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Tells the story about a girl named Alesha who does not get the love of a mother. After a few years, Alesha was taken to Jakarta with her grandmother, Masitoh.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Norfasarie and Huda Ali are both mothers whose online presence is sometimes peppered with the countenance of their young children, whether to share proud mummy moments or as advertising gimmicks. In this season's opener, host Fiza O probes on how much these mummies are willing to share about their children online while sieving out the bad from the good that comes with sharenting.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Khadijah begins volunteering at the welfare home, despite her initial reluctance. Lina is scheming behind Yahya's back. Meanwhile, tensions rise between Musa and Zaki over how the home should be run, especially when Musa begins embracing more progressive ideas.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 18
programme.desc: Eliza, now also known as Raihana also Raizal’s wife, returns to Malaysia to take over part of the business. Yem gets fired from his job. Shanie starts going on blind dates.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 - Weight Issues (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Sihat Oh Sihat S2In the first episode, the doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT medical hub, Haizad Imran and Suzairhe Sumari get together with a panel of celebrity and experts to discuss about weight issues. What is regarded as a healthy weight? What is BMI and how do we calculate it? Can obesity be cured? And what do they actually mean by a healthy diet?

programme.title: (PG) Episode 35 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Rais appoints Saiful to take over Matin as GM of his company. Mazi filled with anger, instructs Matin to hurt Icha by causing harm to Sofea.

programme.title: Episode 177
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Episode 14 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Gold a precious metal that is deeply embedded in Malay culture and social tradition. Also seen as an asset for investors. But is gold really recession-proof? DETIK explains. _x000D_

programme.title: (PG) Episode 6: Sembawang (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Tucked away in Singapore’s northern coast, Sembawang was home to Kampong Wak Hassan, a seaside haven where children caught crabs after school and neighbours gathered in true gotong-royong spirit. This episode traces the shoreline memories.

programme.desc: Kamariah’s grip over Katrina slips as she fails to control her or squeeze money out of her. Meanwhile, Atalia and Dilla lure Haila to Atalia house, determined to put her in her place.

programme.title: Freelance
programme.desc: An unlikely team of a retired army vet, journalist and ruthless dictator needs to work together, stop a coup in South America, and get out alive.

programme.title: The Curse Of La Llorona
programme.desc: In 1970s LA, a social worker and her kids are drawn into the frightening supernatural realm of the Weeping Woman.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A Roman general left for dead seeks vengeance as a gladiator in Ancient Rome.

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Prisoner Of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione return as teenagers for a third term at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and must face a dangerous convict.

programme.title: Freelance
programme.desc: An unlikely team of a retired army vet, journalist and ruthless dictator needs to work together, stop a coup in South America, and get out alive.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world.

programme.title: Man Of Steel
programme.desc: Forced to confront his secret extrastellar origin, Superman learns to fight for Earth when it gets invaded by members of his own race.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs
programme.desc: An ex-homicide detective with memory loss is forced to solve a brutal murder he can't recall.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: When an executive's ex-boyfriend travels through time and brings back a 19th century nobleman, she reluctantly takes responsibility for showing him the 21st century.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Vindicta
programme.desc: A seasoned detective and a newly recruited paramedic are forced into a deadly game of vengeance.

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Prisoner Of Azkaban

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs
programme.desc: An ex-homicide detective with memory loss is forced to solve a brutal murder he can't recall.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron is welcomed into the top of the social food chain by the elite group of popular girls called "The Plastics," ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George in Tina Fey's new twist on the modern classic, MEAN GIRLS.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails are back for their most epic adventure yet. The team reunite to face a new formidable foe, Shadow.

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Goblet Of Fire
programme.desc: A competition will be held between three schools of wizardry. The Goblet of Fire makes its final selection for the competition - Harry Potter.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Chinese-American New Yorker Rachel Chu travels to Singapore with her boyfriend Nick to attend his best friend's wedding. Before long, his secret is out: Nick's family is wealthy, and he's considered the most eligible bachelor in Asia...

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: After being abandoned at the altar by his sweetheart, wedding singer Adam Sandler is jaded by love until he meets a waitress played by Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and Paul Walker reteam for the fourth chapter of the franchise built on speed - Fast and Furious.

programme.title: Land Of Gold
programme.desc: A truck driver finds a young Mexican American girl inside his shipping container and his life takes a turn as he tries to reunite her with her family.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Chinese-American New Yorker Rachel Chu travels to Singapore with her boyfriend Nick to attend his best friend's wedding. Before long, his secret is out: Nick's family is wealthy, and he's considered the most eligible bachelor in Asia...

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Goblet Of Fire
programme.desc: A competition will be held between three schools of wizardry. The Goblet of Fire makes its final selection for the competition - Harry Potter.

programme.title: Sheroes
programme.desc: Four friends on vacation unleash their unique set of skills in the fight for survival against a notorious drug lord.

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Three years after Mike retires from his stripper life, the Kings of Tampa reunite one last time to bring the house down with their muscles and moves.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. The discussions ranging from controvercial topics to gossip and current events. Moreover, surprises from the guests of the show often go beyond all your expectation that you don't want to miss out!

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.desc: Hosted by senior CTi News reporter "Old Z", this in-depth social affairs program revisits major cases that once shook Taiwan. Through detailed reexaminations, viewers gain fresh insights into the events that shaped society.
